law.catch_line: Phase out of tax on provision of physician services.

text.section: A tax is hereby imposed on gross revenues received by each provider for the provision of physician services at the tax rate provided for in subsection (2) of this section.
Gross revenues received by each provider for the provision of physician services after June 30, 1999, shall not be subject to tax imposed by the provisions of this chapter.

law.history: Created 1996 Ky. Acts ch. 110, sec. 2, effective August 1, 1996.
